I get the feeling a lot of people still look down on Pokemon as a simplistic play - thing for children .
In truth , these games are deep , engrossing RPGs that suck you in with their addictive capturing mechanic and endearing worlds .
Consider just how attractive and engaging the top - down handheld entries are , now imagine just how amplified those qualities could be in a 3 D setting .
Nintendo and Game Freak know it 's not that simple .
Both companies have been saying that Pokemon just feels right on handheld , given the nature of its sharing and battle mechanics .
Just how do you bring something so revered into the modern age while still retaining those initial qualities ?
It 'd be a daunting task fraught with danger , but I have faith that Nintendo could pull it off .
